title: Roles
description: Represents a collection of organisations and roles perfomed at said organisations.

org.title: Org
org.description: an organisation that employs people in multiple roles

id.description: an identifier for the organisation; A Simple Icons slug might be preferable.

name.description: the full name of the organisation

shortName.description: an abbreviated name for the organisation, such as UN for United Nations

url.description: the public-facing URL to access the organisation

address.description: the physical location of the organisation workplace

roles.description: an array of roles held at the organisation

role.title: Role
role.description: a job performed at an organisation

name.description: the job title of the role

summary.description: a short description and introduction of the role

highlights.description: a collection of responsibilities of and accomplishments under the role, as bullet points

type.description: the nature of the role in terms of legal obligations

location.description: the nature of the role in terms of workplace

period.description: the time duration for which the role was held

examples.name: GSoC engineer
examples.summary: Developed Vocabulary, the design library of Creative Commons.
highlights: Conceived, designed & developed Vocabulary from scratch.
Initiated & supported Vocabulary integration with CC sites.
